channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish dumped, 8th November
item.description:
Rubbish has been dumped in Glenlea Road - Glenhouse Road junction.

item.title: Council leaf bags need removing ASAP - as public now dumping here, 8th November
item.description:
Council roadsweepers have left piles of bags in raised estate planting beds - and now residents are using it as a dumping ground for domestic and builder's waste. Please clear and ask council contractors not to use raised beds as place to leave waste.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harfield Gardens, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 8th November
item.description:

item.title: Mattresses, 8th November
item.description:
Rubbish near the river edge including mattress.
